title: This Night
description: ******* WARNING *** REVIEWS CONTAIN SPOILERS!!! *********  Grace Allen is bound. When two mysterious visitors show up at her door with an offer of help, Grace is skeptical. Are these men really who they appear to be and can they break the bonds?  In this final installment of The Grace Allen Series hearts are on the line as well as lives and someone will have to lose.
author: Alisha Basso
